regex.name: verpagina
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): title = "Abre la camara" line1 = "Abre la camara" line2 = "MIRA EL TRAFICO EN DIRECTO" line3 = "ADDON FESTA" xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(title, line1, line2, line3) return "plugin://plugin.program.chrome.launcher/?url=http://infocar.dgt.es/etraffic/data/camaras[picapaudgt.param2]&mode=showSite&stopPlayback=no"
